node.title: Public servants offered $10,000 'bonus' as hundreds of staff sacked for refusing COVID jab in NT
node.description: To get public servants to agree to a four-year pay freeze, NT Chief Minister Michael Gunner is offering a $10,000 "bonus" which would be funded using the salaries of staff recently sacked for refusing to get vaccinated.

node.title: Bay of Plenty shark research delayed by DOC permit process
node.description: A shark expert is calling on the Department of Conservation to approve his research permit, so that he can investigate the increasing numbers of great white sharks in the Bay of Plenty.

node.title: 'Life will never be the same': Young mother's despair as father pleads guilty to killing six-month-old
node.description: Evander Wilson, 21, pleaded guilty before the Supreme Court over his actions at his Mildura home in April 2020 that led to the death of his baby son, Jakobi.
